main event: Multiple pilots observed a small bright light that gradually increased in brightness to a very bright ball of white light over a duration of 6 seconds before fading out.
interesting points: The observation was made by pilots,The light moved straight before fading out,The sighting was classified as unknown due to insufficient data,The sighting occurred on July 1, 1959,There seemed to be multiple objects observed during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright ball of white light
